A clear and concise description of the proposed feature.

## Use Case

Describe the use case or problem this feature would solve.

## Proposed Contract Changes

### New Endpoint(s)

- `POST /api/[domain]/[path]`
- `GET /api/[domain]/[path]`
- etc.

### New Field(s)

- Schema: `[SchemaName]`
- Field: `[fieldName]`
- Type: `[type]`

## Impact Assessment

- [ ] Additive change (minor version bump)
- [ ] Breaking change (major version bump - explain why)
- [ ] FE impact (requires frontend lead review)

## Contract File(s) to Modify

- `api-contracts/openapi/v1/[domain].yaml`
